otherNames: Going Rogue in the Apocalypse, Apocalyptic Thief, Rogue of Doom, レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～, 末世盗贼行, 쪼렙 헌터부터 다시 시작
synopsis: A cosmic storm brings about the mutation of species. The city is riddled with dead walkers and monsters roaring and rivaling for the sovereignty of the territory. Survivors awaken to a supernatural power called Star Power to defend against the invaders. Zheng Zhou, who has no Star Power, transmigrated to this apocalyptic world, using his character as a rogue in the game to tear down the dark mists and chase after the supreme power.
